Text:
Sure wish someone would sed this. Been within 10% of full download for days now, as have many others trying to do the same.

It appears we have all shared our pieces/blocks with each other and have come to an unfortunate stop.  

This sort of thing really screws with my up/download ratio.

If any one has 100% of this torrent and are likely be online within the next couple of days, your seeding would be much appreciated.

Ty.
